channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm episode 103 "There's No Scarcity On Piñatas"
channel.description:
In this episode we discuss conferences & traveling, birthday parties for kids, .app domains, and Andrey's new GDPR-related project [Consent Monitor](https://consentmonitor.com)
[Listen to the episode here.](http://bootstrapped.fm/2018/05/22/103-theres-no-scarcity-on-pinatas/) . **Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. [Sign up today and get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)**

More likely, the .app will just remain unused

Prophetic, these words of wisdom.

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm episode 103 "There's No Scarcity On Piñatas"
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
I had mostly cured my bad habit of purchasing domain names on impulse.

However, this episode convinced me to buy the “.app” domain for my SaaS product. I figure that eventually I can use “myproduct.com” for the marketing site and “myproduct.app” for the actual SaaS product - I currently use “app.myproduct.com”.

More likely, the .app will just remain unused, and I’ll keep renewing it every year nevertheless!

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped.fm episode 103 "There's No Scarcity On Piñatas"
